SELECT MT.MEET_CODE as meetingCode , MT.MEET_SUBJECT as meetingSubject , MT.MEET_PEOPLE_NUMBER as meetingPeopleNumber , MT.MEET_OP_DATE as meetingOpenDate , MT.MEET_DATE as meetingDate , MT.MEET_END_DATE as meetingEndDate , MT.MEET_CLOSE_DATE as meetingCloseDate , MT.MEET_NOTICE as meetingNotice , MT.MEET_TYPE_CODE as meetingTypeCode , MT.MEET_TYPE_NAME as meetingTypeName , MT.QUICK_PLAY as quickPlayOrNot , MT.COURT_REG_CODE as courtRegistrationCode , MT.MIN_TIER as minTierCode , MT.MAX_TIER as maxTierCode , CONFIRM_OR_NOT as confirmOrNot , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_MEETING_JOIN WHERE MEET_CODE = MT.MEET_CODE ) as nowPeopleNumber FROM TBL_MEETING MT WHERE MEET_COURT_REG_CODE = #{courtCode} AND MEET_DATE > SYSDATE AND confirmOrNot = 'NO' ORDER BY (meetingPeopleNumber - nowPeopleNumber), meetingDate
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM TBL_MEETING WHERE MEET_COURT_REG_CODE = #{courtCode} AND MEET_DATE > SYSDATE

SELECT MEET_CODE as meetingCode , MEET_SUBJECT as meetingSubject , MEET_PEOPLE_NUMBER as meetingPeopleNumber , MEET_OP_DATE as meetingOpenDate , MEET_DATE as meetingDate , MEET_END_DATE as meetingEndDate , MEET_CLOSE_DATE as meetingCloseDate , MEET_NOTICE as meetingNotice , MEET_TYPE_CODE as meetingTypeCode , MEET_TYPE_NAME as meetingTypeName , QUICK_PLAY as quickPlayOrNot , COURT_REG_CODE as courtRegistrationCode , MIN_TIER as minTierCode , MAX_TIER as maxTierCode , CONFIRM_OR_NOT as confirmOrNot FROM VIEW_MEETING_JOIN WHERE JOIN_ACCT_CODE = #{userAccountCode} AND MEET_JOIN_CANCEL_CODE IS NULL AND MEET_END_DATE < SYSDATE
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM VIEW_MEETING_JOIN WHERE JOIN_ACCT_CODE = #{userAccountCode} AND MEET_JOIN_CANCEL_CODE IS NULL AND MEET_END_DATE < SYSDATE

SELECT MT.MEET_CODE as meetingCode , MT.MEET_SUBJECT as meetingSubject , MT.MEET_PEOPLE_NUMBER as meetingPeopleNumber , MT.MEET_OP_DATE as meetingOpenDate , MT.MEET_DATE as meetingDate , MT.MEET_END_DATE as meetingEndDate , MT.MEET_CLOSE_DATE as meetingCloseDate , MT.MEET_NOTICE as meetingNotice , MT.MEET_TYPE_CODE as meetingTypeCode , MT.MEET_TYPE_NAME as meetingTypeName , MT.QUICK_PLAY as quickPlayOrNot , MT.COURT_REG_CODE as courtRegistrationCode , MT.MIN_TIER as minTierCode , MT.MAX_TIER as maxTierCode , MT.CONFIRM_OR_NOT as confirmOrNot FROM VIEW_MEETING_JOIN MJ LEFT JOIN VIEW_MEETING MT ON MJ.MEET_CODE = MT.MEET_CODE LEFT JOIN VIEW_PLAYLOG PL ON MJ.MEET_JOIN_CODE = PL.MEET_JOIN_CODE WHERE PL.PL_CODE IS NULL AND MJ.JOIN_ACCT_CODE = #{userAccountCode}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM VIEW_EETING_JOIN MJ LEFT JOIN TBL_PLAYLOG ON MJ.MEET_JOIN_CODE = PL.EVALUATOR_MEET_JOIN_CODE WHERE PL.PL_CODE IS NULL AND MJ.MEET_JOIN_CANCEL_CODE IS NULL AND MJ.JOIN_ACCT_CODE = #{userAccountCode} AND MEET_END_DATE < SYSDATE

SELECT MJ.MEET_JOIN_CODE , MT.MEET_CODE as meetingCode , MT.MEET_SUBJECT as meetingSubject , MT.MEET_PEOPLE_NUMBER as meetingPeopleNumber , MT.MEET_OP_DATE as meetingOpenDate , MT.MEET_DATE as meetingDate , MT.MEET_END_DATE as meetingEndDate , MT.MEET_CLOSE_DATE as meetingCloseDate , MT.MEET_NOTICE as meetingNotice , MT.MEET_TYPE_CODE as meetingTypeCode , MT.MEET_TYPE_NAME as meetingTypeName FROM VIEW_MEETING_JOIN MJ LEFT JOIN VIEW_MEETING MT ON MJ.MEET_CODE = MT.MEET_CODE WHERE MJ.JOIN_ACCT_CODE = #{userAccountCode} AND MT.MEET_DATE > SYSDATE AND MJ.MEET_JOIN_CANCEL_CODE IS NULL ORDER BY MT.MEET_DATE

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM VIEW_MEETING_JOIN MJ LEFT JOIN VIEW_MEETING MT ON MJ.MEET_CODE = MT.MEET_CODE WHERE MJ.JOIN_ACCT_CODE = #{userAccountCode} AND MT.MEET_DATE > SYSDATE AND MJ.MEET_JOIN_CANCEL_CODE IS NULL

SELECT MEET_CODE as meetingCode , MEET_SUBJECT as meetingSubject , MEET_PEOPLE_NUMBER as meetingPeopleNumber , MEET_OP_DATE as meetingOpenDate , MEET_DATE as meetingDate , MEET_END_DATE as meetingEndDate , MEET_CLOSE_DATE as meetingCloseDate , MEET_NOTICE as meetingNotice , MEET_TYPE_CODE as meetingTypeCode , MEET_TYPE_NAME as meetingTypeName , QUICK_PLAY as quickPlayOrNot , COURT_REG_CODE as courtRegistrationCode , MIN_TIER as minTierCode , MAX_TIER as maxTierCode , CONFIRM_OR_NOT as confirmOrNot FROM VIEW_MEETING WHERE MEET_CODE = #{meetingCode} ORDER BY MEET_OP_DATE DESC

SELECT MEET_JOIN_CODE as meetJoinCode , MEET_CODE as meetCode , MEET_JOIN_DATE as meetJoinDate , JOIN_ACCT_CODE as joinAccountCode , USER_NICKNAME as userNickname , CATAIN_OR_NOT as captainOrNot , BALL_EXIST_OR_NOT as ballExistOrNot FROM VIEW_MEETING_JOIN WHERE MEET_CODE = #{meetingCode} ORDER BY MEET_JOIN_CODE

SELECT MEET_CODE as meetingCode , MEET_SUBJECT as meetingSubject , MEET_PEOPLE_NUMBER as meetingPeopleNumber , NOWPEOPLENUMBER as nowPeopleNumber , MEET_OP_DATE as meetingOpenDate , MEET_DATE as meetingDate , MEET_END_DATE as meetingEndDate , MEET_CLOSE_DATE as meetingCloseDate , MEET_NOTICE as meetingNotice , MEET_TYPE_CODE as meetingTypeCode , QUICK_PLAY as quickPlayOrNot , COURT_REG_CODE as courtRegistrationCode , MIN_TIER as minTierCode , MAX_TIER as maxTierCode , CONFIRM_OR_NOT as confirmOrNot , CAPTAINCODE as captainAcctCode , CAPTAINNAME as captainName FROM ( SELECT A.* , ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT F2.* FROM ( SELECT MT.* ,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_MEETING_JOIN WHERE MEET_CODE = MT.MEET_CODE ) AS NOWPEOPLENUMBER , ( SELECT USER_NICKNAME FROM VIEW_MEETING_JOIN WHERE CAPTAIN_OR_NOT = 'YES' AND MEET_CODE = MT.MEET_CODE ) as CAPTAINNAME , ( SELECT JOIN_ACCT_CODE FROM VIEW_MEETING_JOIN WHERE CAPTAIN_OR_NOT = 'YES' AND MEET_CODE = MT.MEET_CODE ) as CAPTAINCODE FROM VIEW_MEETING MT WHERE MT.CONFIRM_OR_NOT = 'NO' AND MT.COURT_REG_CODE = #{courtRegistrationCode} AND MT.MEET_DATE > TO_DATE(#{meetingDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AND MT.MEET_TYPE_CODE = #{meetingTypeCode} ) F2 ORDER BY (F2.MEET_PEOPLE_NUMBER - F2.NOWPEOPLENUMBER), F2.MEET_DATE ) A )
WHERE RNUM >= #{start} AND RNUM <= #{end}

SELECT MEET_CODE as meetingCode , MEET_SUBJECT as meetingSubject , MEET_PEOPLE_NUMBER as meetingPeopleNumber , NOWPEOPLENUMBER as nowPeopleNumber , MEET_OP_DATE as meetingOpenDate , MEET_DATE as meetingDate , MEET_END_DATE as meetingEndDate , MEET_CLOSE_DATE as meetingCloseDate , MEET_NOTICE as meetingNotice , MEET_TYPE_CODE as meetingTypeCode , QUICK_PLAY as quickPlayOrNot , COURT_REG_CODE as courtRegistrationCode , MIN_TIER as minTierCode , MAX_TIER as maxTierCode , CONFIRM_OR_NOT as confirmOrNot , CAPTAINCODE as captainAcctCode , CAPTAINNAME as captainName FROM ( SELECT A.* , ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT F2.* FROM ( SELECT MT.* ,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_MEETING_JOIN WHERE MEET_CODE = MT.MEET_CODE ) AS NOWPEOPLENUMBER , ( SELECT USER_NICKNAME FROM VIEW_MEETING_JOIN WHERE CAPTAIN_OR_NOT = 'YES' AND MEET_CODE = MT.MEET_CODE ) as CAPTAINNAME , ( SELECT JOIN_ACCT_CODE FROM VIEW_MEETING_JOIN WHERE CAPTAIN_OR_NOT = 'YES' AND MEET_CODE = MT.MEET_CODE ) as CAPTAINCODE FROM VIEW_MEETING MT WHERE MT.MEET_DATE > TO_DATE(#{meetingDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND MT.MEET_DATE < TO_DATE(#{meetingDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1 AND MT.CONFIRM_OR_NOT = 'NO' AND MT.COURT_REG_CODE = #{courtCode} ) F2 ORDER BY F2.MEET_DATE ) A ) WHERE RNUM >= #{start} AND RNUM <= #{end}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VIEW_MEETING WHERE MEET_DATE > TO_DATE(#{meetingDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND MEET_DATE < TO_DATE(#{meetingDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1 AND CONFIRM_OR_NOT = 'NO' AND COURT_REG_CODE = #{courtCode}

SELECT MEET_CODE as meetingCode , MEET_SUBJECT as meetingSubject , MEET_PEOPLE_NUMBER as meetingPeopleNumber , NOWPEOPLENUMBER as nowPeopleNumber , MEET_OP_DATE as meetingOpenDate , MEET_DATE as meetingDate , MEET_END_DATE as meetingEndDate , MEET_CLOSE_DATE as meetingCloseDate , MEET_NOTICE as meetingNotice , MEET_TYPE_CODE as meetingTypeCode , QUICK_PLAY as quickPlayOrNot , COURT_REG_CODE as courtRegistrationCode , MIN_TIER as minTierCode , MAX_TIER as maxTierCode , CONFIRM_OR_NOT as confirmOrNot , CAPTAINCODE as captainAcctCode , CAPTAINNAME as captainName , CITY_CODE as cityCode , CITY_NAME as cityName , COURT_NAME as courtName FROM ( SELECT A.* , ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT F2.* FROM ( SELECT MT.* ,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_MEETING_JOIN WHERE MEET_CODE = MT.MEET_CODE ) AS NOWPEOPLENUMBER , ( SELECT USER_NICKNAME FROM VIEW_MEETING_JOIN WHERE CAPTAIN_OR_NOT = 'YES' AND MEET_CODE = MT.MEET_CODE ) as CAPTAINNAME , ( SELECT JOIN_ACCT_CODE FROM VIEW_MEETING_JOIN WHERE CAPTAIN_OR_NOT = 'YES' AND MEET_CODE = MT.MEET_CODE ) as CAPTAINCODE , CT.CITY_CODE , CT.CITY_NAME , CRT.COURT_NAME FROM VIEW_MEETING MT LEFT JOIN VIEW_COURT CRT ON MT.COURT_REG_CODE = CRT.COURT_REG_CODE LEFT JOIN VIEW_CITY CT ON CRT.CITY_CODE = CT.CITY_CODE WHERE MT.MEET_DATE > TO_DATE(#{meetingDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND MT.MEET_DATE < TO_DATE(#{meetingDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1 AND MT.CONFIRM_OR_NOT = 'NO' AND CT.REGION_CODE = #{regionCode} ) F2 ORDER BY F2.MEET_DATE ) A ) WHERE RNUM >= #{start} AND RNUM <= #{end}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VIEW_MEETING MT LEFT JOIN TBL_COURT_REGISTRATION CRT ON MT.COURT_REG_CODE = CRT.COURT_REG_CODE LEFT JOIN VIEW_CITY CT ON CRT.CITY_CODE = CT.CITY_CODE WHERE MT.MEET_DATE > TO_DATE(#{meetingDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND MT.MEET_DATE < TO_DATE(#{meetingDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1 AND MT.CONFIRM_OR_NOT = 'NO' AND CT.REGION_CODE = #{regionCode}
